interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Still Mine
Review Date: 2016/11/13
Categories: Drama, International, Gentle, Touching
Product Description: ["James Cromwell gives a tour de force performance in 'Still Mine,' a deeply moving love story about a couple in their twilight years. When Craig sets out to build a more suitable house for his ailing wife Irene, he is blindsided by the bureaucratic codes and officials. As Irene becomes increasingly ill, Craig takes a final stance against all odds to finish the house, in a truly inspirational story."]
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael McGowan'], 'Producers': ['Jody Colero', 'Tamara Deverell', 'Avi Federgreen', 'Michael McGowan', 'Richard Hanet'], 'Starring': ['James Cromwell', 'Geneviève Bujold', 'Chuck Shamata']}
Review Text: well put together. seemed to be well researched by writer. acting superb
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user continues to prioritize heartfelt narratives and emotional depth in storytelling, yet their recent interactions reveal a notable evolution in their viewing preferences. After a decrease in their average rating from 4.4 to 3.9, their latest ratings indicate a heightened demand for coherence and engaging plots. Following a stark negative reaction to a previous film, they exhibited a strong intolerance for overwhelming narratives, culminating in a low rating for a movie they found excessively depressing.

In contrast, the user recently rated a film highly, praising its well-researched storytelling and superb performances. This suggests a shift towards a more discerning approach in their viewing habits, as they increasingly seek originality and substantial storytelling that resonates emotionally while maintaining depth. They appreciate mainstream cinema and notable performances, yet they are raising their standards for meaningful narratives.

The trajectory of their ratings emphasizes their growing critical stance, actively seeking media that is not only enriching but also promotes deep emotional connections. The user values quality performances but demands impactful and engaging plots that align with their discerning taste in storytelling. Overall, they are moving towards a refined selection that balances emotional resonance with narrative coherence.
